channel.title: Wip on Jerome Brette's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Wip on Jerome Brette's Blog

item.title: Zuul
item.description: Goal OpenStack project are using Zuul for CI/CD process. Zuul itself is based on Ansible to perform the tasks. This post is the collection of notes and tips used during the couple of update I did to some openstack projects. Understanding Zuul WIP Usefull Links WIP

item.title: Setup github/gerrit behind a corporate http proxy
item.description: Goal This is a post of the small set of notes taken to setup gerrit review behind corporate proxy. Access GitHub/Gerrit from behind a corporate http proxy TBD Links TBD

item.title: Setup multiple GitHub account on a single machine
item.description: Goal In orderer to manage your personal GitHub projects or an your compagny projects, it is usefull to be able to conigure your .ssh directory. Setup multiple GitHub account TBD Usefull Links Link1
